Docs.summary: Defines a method for adding the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed
